official_title: Recognizing the commitment of Cal Farley's Boys Ranch and Girlstown U.S.A. to raising young people, many of who are from broken homes.

summary.text: Recognizes the commitment of Cal Farley's Boys Ranch and Girlstown U.S.A. to raising young people, many from broken homes, without the financial support of any religious or governmental organization.
